title: DOWNTOWN Huge 2BR Suite AT 1717!
posting_body: ['This beautiful 12th floor suite has awesome lake and city views from large windows in every room.', 'Energy Star Stainless Appliances, Granite counters, LED lighting and In-Suite Washer and Dryer complete your new luxury home.', 'Our central location in Downtown Cleveland puts you close to everything.', 'Walking distance to all professional sports, theater and entertainment options.', 'Heinen’s is just 2 blocks away.', 'Amenities include:', '24 Hour Security', 'Resident Controlled Access Entry', 'Package Receiving Service', 'Business Center with Conference Room Access', 'Community Room', 'Electric Car Charging Stations in our attached parking garage', 'Onsite Maintenance and emergency on-call maintenance', '24 Hour Fitness Center', "Convenient Al's Deli (Breakfast and Lunch)", 'Please contact us for an appointment or virtual tour at', 'show contact info', 'Leasing Office is open:', 'M, W, F 9am -5:30pm', 'T, Th 9am -6pm', 'Sat 10am -3:30pm', 'Pictures are our model suite with some similarities to the suites available.', '**We do not allow AirBNB, Vrbo or any type of short-term rentals or subleasing**']
